CQFunction.Name: CQXPath

CQFunction.Name: CQSum
CQFunction.Args: .//CREDIT_PUBLIC_RECORD[@_Type='Lien' or @_Type='TaxLienCity' or @_Type='TaxLienCounty' or @_Type='TaxLienFederal' or @_Type='TaxLienOther' or @_Type='TaxLienState' or @_Type='MechanicsLien' or @_Type='TaxLien' or @_Type='CityOrCountyTaxLien'][not(@_DispositionType = 'Cancelled' or @_DispositionType = 'Completed' or @_DispositionType = 'Dismissed' or @_DispositionType = 'Paid' or @_DispositionType = 'Released' or @_DispositionType = 'Satisfied' or @_DispositionType = 'Settled' or @_DispositionType = 'Acquitted' or @_DispositionType = 'Terminated' or @_DispositionType = 'Vacated')]/@_LegalObligationAmount

Args.DATA: //CREDIT_PUBLIC_RECORD[(( @_Type = "Lien") or ( @_Type = "CityOrCountyTaxLien") or ( @_Type = "MechanicsLien") or ( @_Type = "PavingAssessmentLien") or ( @_Type = "TaxLien") or ( @_Type = "TaxLienCity") or ( @_Type = "TaxLienCounty") or ( @_Type = "TaxLienFederal") or ( @_Type = "TaxLienOther") or ( @_Type = "TaxLienState") or ( @_Type = "WaterAndSewerLien")) and ((@_DispositionType = "Completed") or (@_DispositionType = 'Discharged') or (@_DispositionType = 'Paid') or (@_DispositionType = 'Satisfied') or (@_DispositionType = 'Settled') or (@_DispositionType='Released') or (@_DispositionType = 'Cancelled') or (@_DispositionType = 'Dismissed') or (@_DispositionType = 'Acquitted') or (@_DispositionType = 'VoluntarilyDischarged') or (@_DispositionType = 'Terminated') or (@_DispositionType = 'InvoluntarilyDischarged') or (@_DispositionType = 'Adjudicated') or (@_DispositionType = 'Granted') or (@_DispositionType = 'RealEstateSold') or (@_DispositionType = 'DischargeInBankruptcy') or (@_DispositionType = 'Vacated') ) and ((@_DispositionDate) and (((substring('~dt~',7)*12 + substring('~dt~',1,2) )-(substring(@_DispositionDate,7)*12 + substring(@_DispositionDate,1,2))+((substring('~dt~',4,2)- substring(@_DispositionDate,4,2)) > 0)) <= 24))]

Args.DATA: //CREDIT_LIABILITY[not(@Action='Delete')][(@_AccountType = 'Installment' ) and ((not(@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'Ignore')) and (not(@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaidWithProceeds'))) and(string-length(@AssetID)<=0) and (@_UnpaidBalanceAmount div @ _MonthlyPaymentAmount > 10)][(count((_CURRENT_RATING[@_Type='Collection' or @_Type='CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type='Repossession' or @_Type='WageEarnerPlanOrBankruptcy' or @_TypeCode='9' or @_TypeCode='8' or @_TypeCode='7']))<=0)]/@_MonthlyPaymentAmount

//CREDIT_LIABILITY[not(@Action='Delete')][(@_AccountType = 'Revolving' )and(string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and ((not(@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'Ignore')) and (not(@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaidWithProceeds'))) and ((@_MonthlyPaymentAmount = 0) or (string-length(@ _MonthlyPaymentAmount)=0)) and ((@_UnpaidBalanceAmount * 0.05) > 10) ][(count((_CURRENT_RATING[@_Type='Collection' or @_Type='CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type='Repossession' or @_Type='WageEarnerPlanOrBankruptcy' or @_TypeCode='9' or @_TypeCode='8' or @_TypeCode='7']))<=0)]/@_UnpaidBalanceAmount

//CREDIT_LIABILITY[not(@Action='Delete')][(@_AccountType = 'Revolving') and (string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and ((not(@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'Ignore')) and (not(@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaidWithProceeds'))) and (not(@ _MonthlyPaymentAmount = 0)) and (string-length(@ _MonthlyPaymentAmount)>0)][(count((_CURRENT_RATING[@_Type='Collection' or @_Type='CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type='Repossession' or @_Type='WageEarnerPlanOrBankruptcy' or @_TypeCode='9' or @_TypeCode='8' or @_TypeCode='7']))<=0)]/@ _MonthlyPaymentAmount

//CREDIT_LIABILITY[not(@Action='Delete')][(@_AccountType = 'Revolving' )and(string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and ((not(@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'Ignore')) and (not(@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaidWithProceeds'))) and ((@ _MonthlyPaymentAmount = 0) or (string-length(@ _MonthlyPaymentAmount)=0)) and (@_UnpaidBalanceAmount > 0) and ((@_UnpaidBalanceAmount * 0.05) < 10)][(count((_CURRENT_RATING[@_Type='Collection' or @_Type='CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type='Repossession' or @_Type='WageEarnerPlanOrBankruptcy' or @_TypeCode='9' or @_TypeCode='8' or @_TypeCode='7']))<=0)]

//CREDIT_LIABILITY[not(@Action='Delete')][((not(@_AccountType = "Mortgage")) and (not(@_AccountType = "Installment" )) and (not(@_AccountType = "CreditLine" )) and (not(@_AccountType = "Revolving" )) and (not(@_AccountType = "Collection" ))) and (string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and ((not(@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'Ignore')) and (not(@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaidWithProceeds')))][(count((_CURRENT_RATING[@_Type='Collection' or @_Type='CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type='Repossession' or @_Type='WageEarnerPlanOrBankruptcy' or @_TypeCode='9' or @_TypeCode='8' or @_TypeCode='7']))<=0)]/@_MonthlyPaymentAmount

//CREDIT_LIABILITY[(@_HighCreditAmount >= 1000) and (_CURRENT_RATING/@_Type = 'AsAgreed') and ((@_AccountOpenedDate) and (((substring('~dt~',7)*12 + substring('~dt~',1,2) )-(substring(@_AccountOpenedDate,7)*12 + substring(@_AccountOpenedDate,1,2))- 1+((substring('~dt~',4,2)- substring(@_AccountOpenedDate,4,2)) >= 0)) >= 12))]

.//CREDIT_LIABILITY[(_CURRENT_RATING/@_Type = 'AsAgreed') and (@_AccountOwnershipType = "Comaker" or @_AccountOwnershipType = "Maker" or @_AccountOwnershipType = "Individual" or @_AccountOwnershipType = "JointContractualLiability" or @_AccountOwnershipType = "JointParticipating") and ((not (CREDIT_COMMENT/_Text)) or ( (CREDIT_COMMENT/_Text) and not (CREDIT_COMMENT/_Text[ contains(translate(.,'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz','ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'),'DISPUTE') or contains(translate(.,'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz','ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'),'DEFER') or contains(translate(.,'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz','ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'),'NOT IN REPAYMENT') or contains(translate(.,'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz','ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'),'UTILITY') or contains(translate(.,'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz','ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'),'CHARGED OFF') or contains(translate(.,'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz','ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'),'CHARGED-OFF') or contains(translate(.,'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz','ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'),'CHILD SUPPORT') or contains(translate(.,'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz','ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'),'ALIMONY') or contains(translate(.,'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz','ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'),'COLLECTION') ]))) and (((@_HighCreditAmount) and (@_HighCreditAmount >= 1000)) or ( (not(@_HighCreditAmount) or ( @_HighCreditAmount = '0') or (string-length(@_HighCreditAmount) <= 0)) and (@_HighBalanceAmount) and (@_HighBalanceAmount >= 1000 )))]

CQFunction.Args: //CREDIT_LIABILITY[((@_AccountType = 'Installment' and @_AccountType != '401KLoan') or @CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentLoan' or @CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentSalesContract') and (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'OpenLiability') and(string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and ((@_UnpaidBalanceAmount div @ _MonthlyPaymentAmount > 10) or @CreditLoanType = 'Lease' or @CreditLoanType = 'AutoLease' or ((count(REMARKS[(@_CODE='Remark5' or @_CODE='Remark41' or @_CODE='Remark81' or @_CODE='Remark94' or @_CODE='Remark101' or @_CODE='Remark297' or @_CODE='Remark345' or @_CODE='Remark376')]) > 0) and @_UnpaidBalanceAmount > 0) or not(@ImportID) ) and (count(_CURRENT_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'RepossessionOrForeclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlanOrBankruptcy')])<=0) and (count(_HIGHEST_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_PRIOR_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_MOST_RECENT_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0)][(string-length(@_AccountOwnershipType)<=0) or @_AccountOwnershipType != 'Comaker' or @_AccountOwnershipType != 'CoSigner' or @_AccountOwnershipType != 'AuthorizedUser'][not((@CreditLoanType = 'Educational') and contains(CREDIT_COMMENT/@_Text, 'Deferred'))]/@_MonthlyPaymentAmount

CQFunction.Name: CQSum
CQFunction.Args: //CREDIT_LIABILITY[//APPLICANTS/APPLICANT[@App1003ID = '~1003id~']/@BorrowerID = APPLICANTS/APPLICANT/@ApplicantIDREF ][( (not(@_AccountType = 'Mortgage') and not(@_AccountType = 'Installment') and not(@_AccountType = 'Rental') and not (@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentLoan') and not(@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentSalesContract')) or not(@_AccountType) ) and (string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and ((@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownBorrower') or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownLoan' ) or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'OpenLiability')) and ((@_MonthlyPaymentAmount <= 0) or ((@_MonthlyPaymentAmount = @_UnpaidBalanceAmount) and (count(REMARKS[@_CODE='Remark232'])>0)) or (@_AccountType = 'Open')) and string-length(@ImportID)>0 and (count(_CURRENT_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'ForeclosureOrRepossession' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' or @_Type = 'BankruptcyOrWageEarnerPlan')])<=0) and (count(_HIGHEST_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_PRIOR_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_MOST_RECENT_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0)]/@_UnpaidBalanceAmount

CQFunction.Name: CQSum
CQFunction.Args: //CREDIT_LIABILITY[//APPLICANTS/APPLICANT[@App1003ID = '~1003id~']/@BorrowerID = APPLICANTS/APPLICANT/@ApplicantIDREF ][( (not(@_AccountType = 'Mortgage') and not(@_AccountType = 'Installment') and not(@_AccountType = 'Rental') and not(@_AccountType = 'Open') and not (@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentLoan') and not(@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentSalesContract')) or not(@_AccountType) ) and(string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and((@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownBorrower') or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownLoan' ) or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'OpenLiability')) and (@_MonthlyPaymentAmount > 0) and not((@_MonthlyPaymentAmount = @_UnpaidBalanceAmount) and (count(REMARKS[@_CODE='Remark232'])>0)) and (string-length(@ImportID)<=0 or (@_UnpaidBalanceAmount - @PayDownAmount)>0) and (count(_CURRENT_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'ForeclosureOrRepossession' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' or @_Type = 'BankruptcyOrWageEarnerPlan')])<=0) and (count(_HIGHEST_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_PRIOR_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_MOST_RECENT_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0)]/@_MonthlyPaymentAmount

CQFunction.Args: //CREDIT_LIABILITY[//APPLICANTS/APPLICANT[@App1003ID = '~1003id~'][DECLARATIONS/DECLARATION[@Name = "PrimaryResidenceIntention" and @Answer = "Y"]]/@BorrowerID = APPLICANTS/APPLICANT/@ApplicantIDREF ][( (not(@_AccountType = 'Mortgage') and not(@_AccountType = 'Installment') and not(@_AccountType = 'Rental') and not(@_AccountType = '401KLoan') and not(@_AccountType = 'Open') and not (@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentLoan') and not (@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentLoan') ) or not(@_AccountType) ) and (string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and ((@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownBorrower') or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownLoan' ) or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'OpenLiability')) and ((@_MonthlyPaymentAmount <= 0) or ((@_MonthlyPaymentAmount = @_UnpaidBalanceAmount) and (count(REMARKS[@_CODE='Remark232'])>0))) and string-length(@ImportID)>0 and (count(_CURRENT_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'RepossessionOrForeclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlanOrBankruptcy')])<=0) and (count(_HIGHEST_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_PRIOR_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_MOST_RECENT_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0)][not((@CreditLoanType = 'Educational') and contains(CREDIT_COMMENT/@_Text, 'Deferred'))][@_AccountOwnershipType != 'AuthorizedUser' or not(@_AccountOwnershipType)]/@_UnpaidBalanceAmount

CQFunction.Name: CQSum
CQFunction.Args: //CREDIT_LIABILITY[//APPLICANTS/APPLICANT[@App1003ID = '~1003id~'][DECLARATIONS/DECLARATION[@Name = "PrimaryResidenceIntention" and @Answer = "Y"]]/@BorrowerID = APPLICANTS/APPLICANT/@ApplicantIDREF ][( (not(@_AccountType = 'Mortgage') and not(@_AccountType = 'Installment') and not(@_AccountType = 'Rental') and not(@_AccountType = '401KLoan') and not(@_AccountType = 'Open') and not (@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentLoan') and not (@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentLoan')) or not(@_AccountType) ) and(string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and((@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownBorrower') or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownLoan' ) or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'OpenLiability')) and (@_MonthlyPaymentAmount > 0) and not((@_MonthlyPaymentAmount = @_UnpaidBalanceAmount) and (count(REMARKS[@_CODE='Remark232'])>0)) and (string-length(@ImportID)<=0 or (@_UnpaidBalanceAmount - @PayDownAmount)>0) and (count(_CURRENT_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'RepossessionOrForeclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlanOrBankruptcy')])<=0) and (count(_HIGHEST_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_PRIOR_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_MOST_RECENT_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0)][not((@CreditLoanType = 'Educational') and contains(CREDIT_COMMENT/@_Text, 'Deferred'))][@_AccountOwnershipType != 'AuthorizedUser' or not(@_AccountOwnershipType)]/@_MonthlyPaymentAmount

CQFunction.Args: //CREDIT_LIABILITY[((@_AccountType = 'Installment' and @_AccountType != '401KLoan') or @CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentLoan' or @CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentSalesContract') and (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'OpenLiability') and(string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and ((@_UnpaidBalanceAmount div @_MonthlyPaymentAmount > 10) or ((@_UnpaidBalanceAmount div @_MonthlyPaymentAmount > 10) and @_MonthlyPaymentAmount > 100) or @CreditLoanType = 'Lease' or @CreditLoanType = 'AutoLease' or ((count(REMARKS[(@_CODE='Remark5' or @_CODE='Remark41' or @_CODE='Remark81' or @_CODE='Remark94' or @_CODE='Remark101' or @_CODE='Remark297' or @_CODE='Remark345' or @_CODE='Remark376')]) > 0) and @_UnpaidBalanceAmount > 0) or not(@ImportID) ) and (count(_CURRENT_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'RepossessionOrForeclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlanOrBankruptcy')])<=0) and (count(_HIGHEST_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_PRIOR_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_MOST_RECENT_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0)][(string-length(@_AccountOwnershipType)<=0) or @_AccountOwnershipType != 'Comaker' or @_AccountOwnershipType != 'CoSigner' or @_AccountOwnershipType != 'AuthorizedUser'][not((@CreditLoanType = 'Educational') and contains(CREDIT_COMMENT/@_Text, 'Deferred'))]/@_MonthlyPaymentAmount

CQFunction.Args: //CREDIT_LIABILITY[( (not(@_AccountType = 'Mortgage') and not(@_AccountType = 'Installment') and not(@_AccountType = 'Rental') and not (@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentLoan') and not(@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentSalesContract')) or not(@_AccountType) ) and (string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and ((@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownBorrower') or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownLoan' ) or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'OpenLiability')) and (@_MonthlyPaymentAmount <= 0) and (@_UnpaidBalanceAmount >0) and string-length(@ImportID)>0 and (@_UnpaidBalanceAmount * 0.05 > 10) and (count(_CURRENT_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'ForeclosureOrRepossession' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' or @_Type = 'BankruptcyOrWageEarnerPlan')])<=0) and (count(_HIGHEST_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_PRIOR_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_MOST_RECENT_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0)]/@_UnpaidBalanceAmount

CQFunction.Args: //CREDIT_LIABILITY[( (not(@_AccountType = 'Mortgage') and not(@_AccountType = 'Installment') and not(@_AccountType = 'Rental') and not (@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentLoan') and not(@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentSalesContract')) or not(@_AccountType) ) and(string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and((@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownBorrower') or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownLoan' ) or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'OpenLiability')) and (@_MonthlyPaymentAmount > 0) and not((@_MonthlyPaymentAmount = @_UnpaidBalanceAmount) and (count(REMARKS[@_CODE='Remark232'])>0)) and (string-length(@ImportID)<=0 or (@_UnpaidBalanceAmount - @PayDownAmount)>0) and (count(_CURRENT_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'ForeclosureOrRepossession' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' or @_Type = 'BankruptcyOrWageEarnerPlan')])<=0) and (count(_HIGHEST_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_PRIOR_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_MOST_RECENT_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0)]/@_MonthlyPaymentAmount

CQFunction.Name: CQXPath
CQFunction.Args: count(//CREDIT_LIABILITY[((not(@_AccountType = 'Mortgage') and not(@_AccountType = 'Installment') and not(@_AccountType = 'Rental') and not(@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentLoan') and not(@CreditLoanType = 'InstallmentSalesContract')) or not(@_AccountType)) and (string-length(@AssetId)<=0) and ((@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownBorrower') or (@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'PaydownLoan' ) or(@LiabilityIgnoreType = 'OpenLiability')) and (@_MonthlyPaymentAmount <= 0) and (@_UnpaidBalanceAmount >0) and string-length(@ImportID)>0 and (@_UnpaidBalanceAmount * 0.05 <= 10) and (count(_CURRENT_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'CollectionOrChargeOff' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'ForeclosureOrRepossession' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' or @_Type = 'BankruptcyOrWageEarnerPlan')])<=0) and (count(_HIGHEST_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_PRIOR_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0) and (count(_MOST_RECENT_ADVERSE_RATING[(@_Type = 'Collection' or @_Type = 'ChargeOff' or @_Type = 'Repossession' or @_Type ='Foreclosure' or @_Type = 'WageEarnerPlan' )])<=0)])
